#labels Compilation,Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy
=Compilation= 

This pages gives you all informations for compiling Rolisteam.

== Dependencies ==

===GNU/Linux===
  * Qt4 (>= 4.4)
  * Phonon

===Windows===
  * Qt4
  * fmod

== Compilation command ==

===All platforms===
 $ qmake

 $ make

Rolisteam will be created in the bin directory.
